name: Means Of Production
description:
Take control of a Russian tank production factory, managing your precious resources and machines to better and faster produce new tanks to help your comrades fight on the frontlines of WW2. 

Created as a group project with Dominik Lacek and Kern JJ, Means of Production tries to present the player with an ingenious way to control a factory in the middle of war times,  creating the tanks 'piece by piece'.
